languages.text: ...отправить сервиторов на прежние работы — они не искупили преступлений своих прошлых жизней и не заслуживают милости.

traits.locale_text: ...отправить сервиторов на прежние работы — они не искупили преступлений своих прошлых жизней и не заслуживают милости.

languages.text: ...to send the servitors back to toil as they had toiled before, for they had not yet paid their dues for the crimes of their past lives and thus did not deserve clemency.
languages.original_text: ...отправить сервиторов на прежние работы — они не искупили преступлений своих прошлых жизней и не заслуживают милости.

traits.locale_text: ...to send the servitors back to toil as they had toiled before, for they had not yet paid their dues for the crimes of their past lives and thus did not deserve clemency.

languages.text: …過去の罪に対する償いを果たしていないため、慈悲には値せず、サーヴィターたちを再び働かせるように命じた。
languages.original_text: ...to send the servitors back to toil as they had toiled before, for they had not yet paid their dues for the crimes of their past lives and thus did not deserve clemency.

traits.locale_text: …過去の罪に対する償いを果たしていないため、慈悲には値せず、サーヴィターたちを再び働かせるように命じた。

languages.text: ... de renvoyer les servitors au dur labeur qui était le leur, car ils n'avaient pas encore payé pour les crimes de leurs vies passées et ne méritaient donc aucune clémence.
languages.original_text: ...to send the servitors back to toil as they had toiled before, for they had not yet paid their dues for the crimes of their past lives and thus did not deserve clemency.

traits.locale_text: ... de renvoyer les servitors au dur labeur qui était le leur, car ils n'avaient pas encore payé pour les crimes de leurs vies passées et ne méritaient donc aucune clémence.

languages.text: ……命令这些机仆回去，像以前一样劳作。这些机仆还没有偿清前世犯下的罪行，因此并不值得宽恕。
languages.original_text: ...to send the servitors back to toil as they had toiled before, for they had not yet paid their dues for the crimes of their past lives and thus did not deserve clemency.

traits.locale_text: ……命令这些奴工回去，像以前一样劳作。这些奴工还没有偿清前世犯下的罪行，因此并不值得宽恕。

languages.text: ... enviar los servidores de vuelta al trabajo, pues aún no habían pagado por los crímenes de sus vidas anteriores y no merecían ninguna clemencia.
languages.original_text: ...to send the servitors back to toil as they had toiled before, for they had not yet paid their dues for the crimes of their past lives and thus did not deserve clemency.

traits.locale_text: ... enviar los servidores de vuelta al trabajo, pues aún no habían pagado por los crímenes de sus vidas anteriores y no merecían ninguna clemencia.

languages.text: ... die Servitoren wieder schuften zu lassen, wie sie zuvor geschuftet hatten. Denn sie hatten noch nicht ausreichend für die Verbrechen in ihren früheren Leben gebüßt und daher keine Milde verdient.
languages.original_text: ...to send the servitors back to toil as they had toiled before, for they had not yet paid their dues for the crimes of their past lives and thus did not deserve clemency.

traits.locale_text: ... die Servitoren wieder schuften zu lassen, wie sie zuvor geschuftet hatten. Denn sie hatten noch nicht ausreichend für die Verbrechen in ihren früheren Leben gebüßt und daher keine Milde verdient.

languages.text: ...Hizmetörlerin eskisi gibi çalıştırılmaya devam edilmesi yönünde oldu. Önceki yaşamlarında işledikleri suçların cezasını henüz çekmedikleri için affedilmeyeceklerdi.
languages.original_text: ...to send the servitors back to toil as they had toiled before, for they had not yet paid their dues for the crimes of their past lives and thus did not deserve clemency.

traits.locale_text: ...hizmetörlerin eskisi gibi çalıştırılmaya devam edilmesi yönünde oldu. Önceki yaşamlarında işledikleri suçların cezasını henüz çekmedikleri için affedilmeyeceklerdi.
